short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically archives all mediafire links on pages you visit by sending them to ArchiveTeam.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will preserve all mediafire links on pages you visit, to try and minimize dead links for you and other people. It sends them to ArchiveTeam, so it does not use any storage or any notable amount of data/bandwidth.
